executionArgs.additionalInstruction:
Generate comprehensive tests for the QuantumLeap Trading Platform using the test plan. The app requires broker authentication (Zerodha/Upstox) to access most features. Use the provided test credentials:

For Zerodha: username="test_user_demo", password="test_password_123"
For Upstox: username="upstox_test_user", password="upstox_test_pass"

Focus on:
1. Authentication flows with broker integration (Zerodha/Upstox)
2. Portfolio management and data display
3. AI chat interface functionality
4. Trading signals and dashboard
5. Mobile responsiveness
6. Accessibility compliance
7. Error handling and edge cases
8. Performance testing

The development server runs on http://localhost:5173.
